name: Physical Preorder
description: A simple single-item Physical order using your Paypal account.
longdescription: Connect your Paypal account and users will get a single-click purchase flow for any commerce item in the system.
pagetip: All messages can be customized in the form.
author: CASH Music
copy_error: There was an error processing your payment. Please reload and try again.
copy_success: Thank you! Here's your download. Mobile users check your inbox and spam folders for a download link.
